name: Clean Water Initiative
des: Provide clean and safe drinking water to rural communities.

name: Tree Plantation Drive
des: Plant trees in deforested areas to combat climate change.

name: Healthcare Support
des: Fund medical camps in remote villages.

name: Education for All
des: Provide educational resources for underprivileged children.

name: Disaster Relief Fund
des: Support families affected by recent floods.

name: Animal Welfare Program
des: Provide shelter and food for stray animals.
